short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shaq deserves his own week way more than sharks do, so this extension replaces shark mentions with awesome Shaq mentions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension finds instances of "shark" and "sharks" and related grammatical phrases and replaces them with instances of "Shaq". Why? Because it makes me laugh.
